B

bankPaysPlayer(Player, int) - Static method in class Model.BankTransactions
transformer: the bank will pay the player an amount of money
Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
Postcondition: The bank has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
BankTransactions - Class in Model
This class contains the static methods for all the money transactions that occur between the players or between the player and the bank
BankTransactions() - Constructor for class Model.BankTransactions
 
Board - Class in Model
This class is the board of the game, which contains an ArrayList of Tiles
Board() - Constructor for class Model.Board
constructor: Constructs a new Board which contains:
1 StartTile (Always the first tile) 1 PaydayTile (Always the last tile) 8 MessageTiles(4 of each type)(Random Position) 5 DealTiles (Random Position) 2 SweepStakesTiles (Random Position) 3 LotteryTiles (Random Position) 2 RadioTiles (Random Position) 6 BuyerTiles (Random Position) 2 FamilyCasinoTiles (Random Position) 2 YardSaleTiles (Random Position) postcondition: Creates and initializes the board of the game
BoardTest - Class in JUnitTests
 
BoardTest() - Constructor for class JUnitTests.BoardTest
 
buyer() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: If the player has no deal cards nothing happens, else the buyerMode of the CardInventoryUI call is called where the player selects one of his deal cards to sell
postcondition: The buyerMode of the CardInventoryUI has been called, or nothing has happened (depends if the player has deal cards or not)
buyerCardSelected(DealCard) - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: Is called by the CardInventoryUI after a player has selected a deal card to sell, the player is given his money and the sold deal card is added to the removed deal cards deck.
buyerMode(Controller) - Method in class View.CardInventoryUI
 
BuyerTile - Class in Model.Tiles
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
BuyerTile() - Constructor for class Model.Tiles.BuyerTile
constructor: Constructs a new LotteryTile with the given parameters orderNumber and imagePath
postcondition: Creates and initializes a LotteryTile with the given orderNumber and imagePath
